trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert 16-bit signed integer objects to and from other representations.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于将 16 位有符号的整数对象与其他表示形式之间实现相互转换的类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a 16-bit signed integer object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: 此转换器只能在 16 位有符号的整数对象与字符串之间实现转换。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int16> value type represents signed integers with values ranging from negative 32768 through positive 32767.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int16>值类型表示介于-32768 到 + 32767 之间的值的有符号的整数。</xref:System.Int16>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Int16.Parse%2A> method of <xref:System.Int16> with the integer value of <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Int16.Parse%2A>的<xref:System.Int16>与<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>.</xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>的整数值</xref:System.Int16>的方法</xref:System.Int16.Parse%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method uses the general ("G") format for the string returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>方法使用常规 ("G") 格式对返回的字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基类和[如何︰ 实现类型转换器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of an Int16Converter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 决不要创建的 Int16Converter 实例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基的类</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的示例

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Int16Converter"></xref> class.
